1. space a to the power of m space cross times space a to the power of n equals space a to the power of m space end exponent plus space to the power of n
2. space square root of open parentheses a cross times b close parentheses end root space equals square root of a cross times space square root of b
3. to the power of g log space open parentheses a. b close parentheses equals to the power of g log space a space plus space to the power of g log space b
